subtitle: These make a delightful starter - or  lunch when served with salad.

method.text: Finely chop the seafood with a knife or coarsely blend in a food processor.
Place the milk and egg into a food processor and blend. Add the seasoning and spoon the flour onto the rotating blades through the funnel of a food processor. Blend until smooth.
In a mixing bowl, blend the batter and seafood together until evenly mixed.

Heat the oil in a heavy based frying pan. Fry spoonfuls of the batter mixture in the oil for 2-3 min or until golden brown and cooked through. Turn the fritters over once during cooking. Drain the fritters on crumpled up kitchen paper.

title: Anglesea seafood fritters
